content.rendered:
bar de beauté à Griffintown | THE TEN SPOT®

bienvenue au bar de beauté 10spot® à griffintown, montréal. notre équipe est pleine d’experts qualifiés qui savent comment vous faire paraître et vous sentir mieux ! nous proposons une variété de services comme l’épilation à la cire, les soins du visage, le soin des ongles et l’épilation au laser. lorsque vous nous rendrez visite, notre formidable équipe vous mettra sur la bonne voie pour prendre les mesures nécessaires pour vous se sentir comme un dix.

reserve maintenant!
acheter cartes cadeaux
devenir membre
inscription à la newsletter

Add Waypoint
show options hide options

Recherche des itinéraires…...

Print directions
bar de beauté à Griffintown | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 1646 notre dame west montreal, quebec
  • 514-935-1001
  • griffintown@thetenspot.com

Hours

lundi: 10:00 am – 6:00 pm

mardi: 10:00 am – 6:00 pm

mercredi: 10:00 am – 6:00 pm

jeudi: 10:00 am – 8:00 pm

vendredi: 10:00 am – 8:00 pm

samedi: 9:00 am – 6:00 pm

dimanche: 10:00 am – 5:00 pm

notre bar à beauté les services

clous

nous offrons la meilleure manucure-pédicure en ville ! nous proposons des extensions d’ongles, des ongles en gel, des pédicures et bien d’autres encore.

voir le menu des services

épilation

nous proposons des services d’épilation de premier ordre conçus pour vous faire sentir comme notre brazilly®, notre thongkini®, notre épilation générale pour tout le corps et bien plus encore.

voir le menu des services

soins du visage

notre équipe possède de sérieuses compétences en matière de soins du visage. nous proposons des procédures faciales sans stress comme des soins du visage anti-âge, du dermaplaning, des peelings chimiques et bien d’autres encore.

voir le menu des services

les sourcils

quelle meilleure façon de vous faire plaisir qu’en vous faisant refaire les sourcils et les cils. que vous recherchiez un rehaussement de cils, un lifting des sourcils ou plus, nous faisons tout.

voir le menu des services

laser

l’épilation peut être délicate, c’est pourquoi nous simplifions les choses avec notre superbe gamme de traitements d’épilation au laser comme notre laser bikini, notre laser complet du corps et bien plus encore.

voir le menu des services
réservez maintenant à cet endroit!

consultez nos superbes critiques!

I came for pedicures with my 6 year old niece and we loved our experience! The salon was super cute with her and she was set up like a princess with orange juice in a fancy cup and Peppa Pig on the tv. The spa is clean, bright and everyone there was... super friendly and professional. We’ll definitely be back!plus
Elma Algz
1719154853
I went for a manicure and I had great results. The staff is very professional and kind, facilities and ambiance are pleasant. Great experience!
Mariya Georgieva
1718386646
I went there without a booking and they were very warm and took me on the spot. The service was excellent, I really liked it. They made me feel comfortable once i got there. It’s highly recommended.🫶🏼
Tressy Nadal
1716915642
I loved my experienceRight on timeFor the first time my nails are not soft after gel removalI had my nails done with Stephany she was great!
Shahad Alharazi
1714686457
I went with my father and 3 year old daughter for a manicure (her first! 💙). The staff was welcoming, professional and accommodating. We had an amazing experience. Could not recommend it more.
Katherine Sporns
1713530020
Great service! They offer drinks, a free toe wax, and plenty of colours! I've come back a few times already and they provide excellent service each and every time 👌🏽
Lequanne Collins-Bacchus
1711814516
I came for a gel pedicure and I had a great service!It was fast and the result was lovely😄The nail tech and the receptionist were very sweet , I would definitely recommend this salon!
Eleana Renteria
1711807884
Amazing experience at Ten Spot Griffintown. I get my manicure and pedicure done here and I’m always happy with the result. The team is super friendly and efficient. Highly recommend!
Mariam Yacoubi
1711807625
The staff is very friendly and I always leave satisfied with the service. Today I had my eyebrows waxed and it looked great!
Mónica Fiorella Cabrejos Del Aguila
1710519582
I loved my experience at the Ten Spot Griffintown! The girls are super sweet and friendly! And I got my waxing and pedicure done by Sara, she’s very efficient with her work:) I was satisfied!Again the girls are the best and I highly recommend this... place!plus
Anjali Jasi
1710018096
Great experience! Got our nails done. They offered us coffee/tea and were very warm and welcoming!
Mike Piazza
1708018816
I had an amazing experience with Sara for a wax. She was super efficient yet extremely thorough and at the end when she asked me to check that she had gotten all the areas I wanted, it was perfect. She also did a good job at minimizing the... discomfort. Will definitely be going back to her!plus
Theo
1702578451
